channel.title: projects on Vinod Kurup
channel.description: Recent content in projects on Vinod Kurup

item.title: Imperfection
item.description: I’ve had a lot of great plans which I’ve never fulfilled. Don’t get me wrong. My life is beyond great and I see it getting better every day. There just happen to be a lot of things that I’ve planned to do which I have not done. I planned to create a web-based running log. I actually did do this and used it for a long time, but I never did build in enough features to make it worthwhile for others to use.
